criteria: Ability to create equations in two variables
Ability to represent relationships between quantities
descriptions: No attempt to create equations or equations are completely irrelevant.
Creates equations, but they contain significant errors or only represent a superficial understanding of the relationship.
Creates equations with some errors or inconsistencies in representing the relationships between quantities.
Creates equations that generally represent the relationships between quantities, but may lack precision or clarity.
Creates accurate and clear equations in two variables that effectively represent the relationships between quantities.

Creates sophisticated and accurate equations in two variables, demonstrating a deep understanding of the relationships between quantities. Equations are clearly presented and may offer additional insights.
No graph is present or the graph is completely inaccurate and lacks labels.
Graph is present but contains major inaccuracies, is poorly labeled, or lacks scales.
Graph has some inaccuracies, missing labels, or inconsistent scales.
Graph is mostly accurate with appropriate labels and scales, but may contain minor errors.
Accurate graph with clear labels and consistent scales, demonstrating a good understanding of graphical representation.

Precise and well-presented graph with detailed labels and consistent scales, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of graphical representation. The graph enhances the understanding of the relationships.
Fails to identify or represent the relationships between quantities.
Attempts to represent relationships but demonstrates a poor understanding of the quantities involved.
Represents some relationships, but with significant inaccuracies or omissions.
Represents most relationships accurately, but may overlook subtle connections or complexities.
Clearly and accurately represents the relationships between quantities, demonstrating a strong understanding of the context.
Masterfully represents the relationships between quantities, providing insightful analysis and a deep understanding of the underlying principles.
